price: He hecho el Corán fácil de entender y memorizar. Pero, ¿habrá alguien que lo reflexione?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ يَسَّرۡنَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ لِلذِّكۡرِ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad yassarnā al-qur'āna lildhik'ri fahal min muddakirin
